name: 高淩菁
objective: 本課程的重點在於闡述統計學之基本概念，主要的內容涵蓋三個領域：敘述統計、機率理論與推論統計，其中包含概念介紹、敘述統計、機率理論、推論統計。另有統計學的應用領域於推論未知的情況以作為相關決策之依據，並包含統計軟體使用介紹。
schedule:
Week 1: Course overview
Week 2: Ch2. Organizing and Visualizing Data
Week 3: Ch3. Numerical Descriptive Measures
Week 4: Ch4. Basic Probability
Week 5: Ch5. Discrete probability distributions
Exam 1
Week 6: Ch6. The Normal Distribution and other continuous distributions
Week 7: Ch7. Sampling and sampling distributions
Week 8: Ch8. Confidence interval estimation
Week 9: Ch9. Fundamentals of Hypothesis Testing: One-sample tests
Exam 2
Week 10: Ch10. Two-sample tests
Week 11: Ch 11. ANOVA
Week 12: Ch 12. Chi-Square tests and nonparametric tests
Week 13: Ch 13. Simple linear regression #1
Week 14: Ch 13. Simple linear regression #2
Week 15: Ch 14 & 15. Multiple regression
Week 16: Ch 16 Time-series forecasting #1
Week 17: Ch 16 Time-series forecasting #2
Week 18: Final Exam
scorePolicy:
In-class quiz: 20% (every class except the first day and exam days)
Homework: 15%
Exam 1: 20%
Exam 2: 20%
Final Exam: 25%
materials:
Required Textbook:
Basic Business Statistics: Concept and Application, 12th Edition,
by Berenson, Levine, and Krehbiel
Reference books:
看漫畫,學統計,史密斯/著,高尼克/繪, 鄭惟厚/譯, 天下文化
統計學導論,方世榮和張文賢/著, 華泰文化
